src:
Granata v Novem mestu
01 Nov 2019, 17:55 by B. B.
Malo po 13. uri je na travniku v bližini ulice Žlebej v Novem mestu krajan našel neeksplodirano ubojno sredstvo. Pripadnika Državne enote za varstvo pred neeksplodiranimi ubojnimi sredstvi Zahodnoštajerske regije sta odstranila in do uničenja shranila na varno dva topovska projektila kalibra 75 mm, italijanske  izdelave, ostanek 2. svetovne vojne.
Med 31. 10. 2019, od 6. ure in 1. 11. 2019, do 6. ure, so policisti Policijske uprave Ljubljana med opravljanjem nalog varovanja državne meje na območju Kočevja, Črnega potoka in Novih Lazov izsledili in prijeli 25 tujcev ( drž. Maroka, Alžirije, Afganistana in Sirije ), ki so nezakonito prestopili državno mejo. Postopki policistov s tujci še niso zaključeni.
V Sodražici je nekdo vlomil v garažo, iz katere je izginilo orodje. Premoženjska škoda znaša okoli 500 evrov.
text:
Grenade in Novo mesto
01 Nov 2019, 16:55 by B.B.
Shortly after 1pm, a local man found an unexploded ordnance in a meadow near Žlebej Street in Novo mesto. Members of the National Explosive Ordnance Protection Unit of the Western Styrian Region have removed and stored to safety two cannon projectiles of 75 mm caliber, of Italian manufacture, from World War II.
Between October 31, 2019, from 6 a.m. and Jan. 1, 2019, until 6 p.m., 25 foreigners were tracked down and apprehended by police officers of the Ljubljana Police Department during the performance of state border protection in the area of Kočevje, Črni potok and Novi Laz. Morocco, Algeria, Afghanistan and Syria) that have crossed the national border illegally. The proceedings of police officers with foreigners have not yet been completed.
In Sodražica, someone broke into a garage from which a tool had disappeared. Property damage amounts to about $ 500.
